hero.heroSubtitle: Fine cuisine in a historic setting

about.aboutContent:
Dear Guests
Welcome to Gleis 3 Restaurant,
our new in-place in Interlaken. We strive to provide our guests with cozy hours and help them forget the worries of everyday life.
Friendliness, hospitality, and warmth are very important to us.
We offer local dishes, prepared with great care by our kitchen team Ralf Wachter & Farid Ahmadzai.
Food is freshly prepared with love, so waiting times may occur – beverages are handled with care, and everything is served with a friendly smile. That's our motto.
If you want to celebrate a special occasion, we will cook your favorite dish and make the event a joyful one.
We wish you pleasant, beautiful, and entertaining hours in our house! The Reshanth family and the Gleis 3 team

list.text: We were looking for traditional Swiss food and were delighted by this amazing gem! The service was phenomenal, the food was freshly prepared to order and tasted incredibly good. You will not be disappointed when you visit Gleis 3 if you are ever in Interlaken. It is absolutely wonderful!
list.name: Wenda Smock

list.text: Traditional food, flawlessly prepared. Reshanth was an incredible host. I’ve tried many excellent places in Interlaken, but this one is perhaps the best. The dining area seats maybe 24 people and many guests enjoy the cheese fondue, which can be overwhelming, but then you probably shouldn’t go into a traditional Swiss restaurant.
list.name: Aron Singletary

list.text: Delicious dishes that are exquisitely presented and taste just as good as they look. The portions are large and reasonable for the price. Big praise goes to the owner Ritchie, who was super friendly and attentive and made sure we felt comfortable from the moment we entered the restaurant and were excellently served throughout the entire meal. Highly recommended!
list.name: Christian Ong Tiong Han

menu.welcomeText:
Warm welcome to our restaurant Gleis 3
Dear guest, Please read our restaurant concept carefully!!!
1. We cook all dishes fresh à la minute after your order. Therefore, there may be waiting times. We thank you in advance for your understanding.
2. The plate is intended for one person, but you are welcome to share it among yourselves. However, please note that each guest must order a main course.
3. Please note that we do not offer tap water in our restaurant and bringing private drinks, including water, is not allowed. Thank you for your understanding.
We thank you for following our rules and wish you a pleasant and enjoyable time at our restaurant Gleis 3.
Fam. Reshanth and the Gleis 3 team
